description: Master's program focused on analyzing large volumes of data, machine learning, and Big Data technologies. It includes practical projects that provide experience in handling massive data and implementing data-driven solutions.

degree: Bachelor's in Computer Engineering, Software Systems and Multimedia Applications
description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering with a specialization in software development and multimedia applications. The program covers a wide range of topics, including programming, databases, networks, and user interface design. It includes practical projects that provide experience in software development and multimedia applications.
